content: top design for any type of yarn fiber in fingering weight #1 i made this top with approx scheepjess whirlette 0 5 balls 860-ice & beauty silk cotton 2 balls 04-beige if you wish to make the top bigger you can increase the yarn weight and the crochet hook by adding extra row for length this design also allows for creative flexibility allowing you to arrange the granny squares in various ways to make a truly unique piece this pattern is for the small and cropped version for your reference simply adjust and play around with the squares to get your own unique piece pattern for intermediate skill levels this top is created with a total number of 49 granny squares no special shaping is required squares are joined with the zig-zag slipstitch top finished up with edge stitch along the bottom sleeves openings and neckline i hope you enjoy making this top feel free to drop me a message if you need help english is not my first language and i m always learning i do my best to share my patterns as clearly as possible thank you for your understanding patience and support
